question: 近くに
sourceMnemonic: This is the noun version of the kanji <kanji>near</kanji>. So it also means <vocabulary>near</vocabulary>, or in the <vocabulary>neighborhood</vocabulary> of something.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You already learned this reading when you learned <ja>近い</ja>, so you should be able to read this word as well.
